title: Land At Junction With Cobden View Road Northfield Road Sheffield S10 1QQ - ecological assessment

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Work has begun to clear land north of Cobden View Road (planning ref: 22/00723/FUL).
One of the conditions of approval was that before any work commences: a walkover of the site shall be undertaken by a qualified ecologist to ensure that the development would not disturb any nesting birds or other wildlife which may have moved onto the site. The findings
of the walkover shall be submitted in writing to the Local Planning Authority and
any necessary mitigation works carried out.
Has this been carried out and can the findings be published?
Yours faithfully,
Hamish

Dear Hamish Meichan,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Ecological
Assessment which we received on 21/02/2025.
As your request is a request for information relating to the environment,
this has been logged as a request under the Environmental Information
Regulations 2004 (EIR) and will be dealt with under the Regulations. The
reference number for your request can be found above.
The Environmental Information Regulations 2004 state that we must respond
to you within 20 working days, by 24/03/2025. Please do not hesitate to
contact us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Please note that from 1^st January 2025, as part of our commitment to
improving services, the council will accept EIR requests via the online
form which can be found here:
